column4: Hello. I am so ungry. I have had a skype in my machine. how can I protect my machine for this intruders?
i mean spy!!
how did they get in?
I was chating on the window of messenger in AMSN. when somebody with my nick stars to chat in the same window.
are you sure that that was't you?
I am sure I do not have double personality... ...
it could be a security vulnerability in AMSN
I thougth some like that. But how can I know it?
does the same thing happen if you run AMSN again and do similar things happen to anything else?
I have just experienced once. But I do not want to experience it again
It was not funny...
try using something other than AMSN
I am using Mercury ... I think It is better than amsn, I lost the curiosity for this 2 years ago but I've back
are you using a router?
or any other type of firewall?
yeah I think something about. But I am new user of routers.
if you're behind a router or another type of firewall, that should stop a lot of breakins
Idid not understand tou
the router should help keep you safe from people hacking into your computer.  Firewalls will do the same thing
You mean I do not need another firewall?
more firewalls tends to make things safer, but a router is usually enough
I will true!!
